## Fourier series

> a periodic function can be described as a sum of sines and cosines.

::: {.column-margin}
Not any function, but certainly most functions we will deal with in this course. The function has to fullful the [Dirichlet conditions](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dirichletâ€“Jordan_test)
:::
